org.hu.hom.api.config

Class Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hu.hom.api.config.Config
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Constants

    public class Config
extends java.lang.Object
implements Constants

    Provides the GeneticAlgorithm with the options:

    • mutationPercentage: The percentage of mutants that will be picked to do operations on.
    • maxOrder: The order of the HigherOrderMutant to not be exceeded.
    • runRepeat: The number of times the algorithm will run.

    And provides the GeneticAlgorithm with the termination conditions:

    • maxHoms: The maximum number of HigherOrderMutants to generate.
    • requiredSubtleHoms: The maximum number of subtle HigherOrderMutants to generate.
    • maxGeneration: The max generation to reach.
    • timeout: Timeout in seconds.

    And provides the GeneticAlgorithm with paths:

    • originalFile: Path to original .java file under execution.
    • testCasesPath: Path to test suites .class files.
    • resultPath: Path to store the results to.
    • classPath: Class path to be used for test execution, must contain junit.jar and hamcrest.jar.
    Author:
    Asendar
